name: mcp-sqlite
description: SQLite MCP server for executing SQL queries
long_description: An MCP server that provides tools to interact with SQLite databases, including executing queries that return all results, single results, or performing data modifications.

tools.name: sqlite_all
tools.description: This method executes a prepared statement and returns all results as an array of objects

tools.name: sqlite_get
tools.description: This method executes a prepared statement and returns the first result as an object

tools.name: sqlite_run
tools.description: This method executes a prepared statement and returns an object summarizing the resulting changes

user_config.name: db
user_config.description: Path to the SQLite database file
